physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a cantonment by the Salween River in Moulmein. In the center of the photograph
 there are rows of roofed buildings amidst trees and vegetation. On the bottom-left of the photograph there is a three-leveled building structure. The Salween River is in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

On the bottom-left of the photograph there is a three-leveled building structure. The Salween River is in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
